mapper.select: SELECT ss.*, ( SELECT CONCAT( store_name, "(", sub_store_name, ")" ) FROM `store_manage` WHERE id = ss.store_manage_id ) AS storeName FROM store_series_list ss ${ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT sm.id, IF ( LENGTH( TRIM( sm.`sub_store_name` )) > 0, CONCAT( sm.`store_name`, '(', sm.`sub_store_name`, ')' ), sm.`store_name` ) AS storeName, sm.logo_addr AS logoAddr, sm.sys_user_id AS sysUserId, ss.store_abstract AS storeAbstract FROM store_series_list ss LEFT JOIN `store_manage` sm ON ss.store_manage_id = sm.id WHERE sm.`status` = '1' AND sm.attestation_status IN ( 1, 2 ) AND ss.del_flag = '0' AND ss.store_series_manage_id = #{storeSeriesManageId} ORDER BY ss.sort
